Listen: Mike Polizze "Wishing Well"

By Iggy Pot - July 15, 2020

Mike Polizze returns with “Wishing Well,” the third single from his upcoming debut solo LP Long Lost Solace Find due out July 31st via Paradise of Bachelors. The new track follows up on previous peeks into the upcoming record including “Cheewawa” and “Revelation.” Additionally, Polizze is currently the feature interview over at American Songwriter.

Like previous efforts, this new cut is an acoustic joint with long-time friend Kurt Vile. Ambling rolls of finger picked guitar set the stage here for Polizze’s ode to letting go. With Vile providing backing vocals and Polizze adding a piano part to the mix, this meditative ballad is another example of the singer/songwriter’s knack for delivering deep truths with laconic ease.
